suite.name: Tasks

kw.name: Windows Run
kw.doc: Use Windows Run window to launch an application.
kw.msg: Sending keys 'C:\\Program Files (x86)\\SAP\\FrontEnd\\SAPgui\\saplogon.exe' to element: <module 'uiautomation' from 'c:\\ProgramData\\robocorp\\ht\\e0a6775_b1f3c24_1c0bc041\\lib\\site-packages\\uiautomation\\__init__.py'>

kw.name: Connect To Session
kw.doc: Connects to an open session SAP.

kw.name: Open Connection
kw.doc: Opens a connection to the given connection name. Be sure to provide the full connection name, including the bracket part.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Inserts the given text into the text field identified by locator. Use keyword `input password` to insert a password in a text field.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Inserts the given text into the text field identified by locator. Use keyword `input password` to insert a password in a text field.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Inserts the given password into the text field identified by locator. The password is not recorded in the log.

kw.name: Send Vkey
kw.doc: Sends a SAP virtual key combination to the window, not into an element. If you want to send a value to a text field, use `input text` instead.

kw.name: Get Text From Pdf
kw.doc: Get text from set of pages in source PDF document.

kw.name: Create File
kw.doc: Creates a file with the given content and encoding.

kw.name: Append To File
kw.doc: Appends the given content to the specified file.

kw.name: Get Regexp Matches
kw.doc: Returns a list of all non-overlapping matches in the given string.

kw.name: Run Transaction
kw.doc: Runs a Sap transaction. An error is given when an unknown transaction is specified.

kw.name: Select Context Menu Item
kw.doc: Selects an item from the context menu by clicking a button or right-clicking in the node context menu.

kw.doc: Inserts the given text into the text field identified by locator. Use keyword `input password` to insert a password in a text field.
